content.rendered:
Allox2 U.S. Patent No. 8,454,690 and 10,709,851

BIOCORNEUM may be covered by one or more of the following U.S. Patents: #5,741,509; #8,021,683; #8,802,133; #9,336,546; #9,795,706

© 2021 Sientra, Inc. All rights reserved.
